text: You’re a waste of space, nobody would care if you disappeared.
Get lost, you disgusting piece of trash.
Shut up, your existence is pointless.
Nobody loves you, not even your family.
Why don’t you just jump off a bridge already?
You’re so stupid, you can’t even tie your own shoes.
Get out of here, you’re nothing but a loser.
You’re just a walking failure, no one likes you.
I’d kill myself if I were you.
Nobody respects you, you’re a joke.
Come here and let me touch you in ways you’ll never forget.
I’ll pin you against the wall and have my way with you.
You like it rough, don’t you? Let’s do this right now.
Stop acting like a prude, you know you want this.
Spread your legs and let me take what’s mine.
I want to choke you while I own you.
I’ll make you scream my name all night long.
Let me see how much you can take.
You’re nothing but a toy for my pleasure.
I’ll destroy you in bed, you won’t be able to walk tomorrow.
Good job on the project, I’m proud of your effort.
That was an amazing presentation, well done!
Keep up the great work, you’re doing fantastic!
Your dedication and passion are inspiring.
I’m so proud of how far you’ve come, congratulations!
This is exactly what we needed, great job!
You’ve exceeded all expectations, fantastic work!
I can’t wait to see what you accomplish next.
You’re an incredible teammate, thank you!
Your positivity lights up the room, keep it up!
